dmca.title: Amphibian Info Appropriated for AdSense site
dmca.body:
Attn: AdSense Support, DMCA complaints To Whom It May Concern,

I am the manager of the site, AmphibiaWeb.org. I wish to alert you to the website animalport.com, which consists primarily of stolen copyrighted material from various other websites, including ours. We at Amphibiaweb normally allow the limited use of our material (see our policy at http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/datause.html), but animalport.com is using this material to turn a profit, primarily using the Google Adsense service. We would like this to stop. The following sections lay out the situation in more detail:
1. The information and many of the photos from following pages were copied from Amphibiaweb.org and placed on animalport.com:
http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Allophrynidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Arthroleptidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Ascaphidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/hstsBombinatoridae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Brachycephalidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Bufonidae.shtinl http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Centrolenidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Dendrobatidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Discoglossidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Heleophrynidae.shtml http://www. amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Hemisotidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Hylidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Hyperoliidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Leiopelmatidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Leptodactylidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Mantellidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Megophryidae.shtml hftp://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Microhylidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Myobatrachidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Nasikabatrachidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Pelobatidae.shtml

http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Pelodytidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.orglaw/lists/Pipidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Pseudidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Ranidae.shtml httpi/vvwvv.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Rhacophoridae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Rhinodermatidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Rhinophrynidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Sooglossidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Ambystomatidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Amphiumidae.shtml httpi/www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Cryptobranchidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Dicamptodontidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Hynobiidae.shtml http:I/ww-w.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Plethodontidae.shtml httpilwww.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Proteidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Rhyacotritonidae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Salamandridae.shtml http://www.amphibiaweb.org/aw/lists/Sirenidae.shtml
2. The following pages from animalport.com were taken directly from Amphibiaweb.org:
http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Allophrynidae.html http: //animalport. com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Arthroleptidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Ascaphidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toadsBombinatoridae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toadsBrachycephalidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toadsBufonidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Centrolenidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Dendrobatidae.html http://animalport. com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Discoglossidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Heleophrynidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Hemisotidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Hylidae.html

http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Hyperoliidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Leiopelmatidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Leptodactylidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Mantellidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Megophryidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Microhylidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Myobatrachidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Nasikabatrachidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Pelobatidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Pelodytidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Pipidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Pseudidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Ranidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Rhacophoridae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Rhinodermatidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Rhinophrynidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/frogs-toads/Sooglossidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Ambystomatidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Amphiumidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Cryptobranchidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Dicamptodontidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Hynobiidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Plethodontidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Proteidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Rhyacotritonidae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Salamandridae.html http://animalport.com/amphibians/salamanders/Sirenidae.html


I can be contacted at: [private]@berkeley.edu

The contact listed with the animalport.com domain name is:
[private] ([private]@yahoo.com) [private], Boston, MA 02116
	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

	I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private], AmphibiaWeb Coordinator Museum of Vertebrate Zoology
[private], University of California
Berkeley, CA 94720-3160
